Text: I have VLC - works fine on mine, though the first minute skips a bit. That was a problem with the DVD.

EXCELLENT !!  I've watched many holocaust documentaries, but these are superb, very well done, if you don't shudder at the horror of it all, then you must be one of those neo-nazis scum... 
I had trouble to watch them at first but after converting to standard avi, they worked fine. It must have been awful to have been a jew in those terrible times.
